item.title: Subversion使用socks5代理
item.author: mail@hatterjiang.com Hatter Jiang
item.description:
http://www.pps.univ-paris-diderot.fr/~jch/software/polipo/

make

-rwxr-xr-x polipo

c.conf:

socksParentProxy = "localhost:7777"
socksProxyType = socks5
proxyPort = 7778

polipo -c c.conf > log 2>&1 &

[groups]
groupgooglecode = *.googlecode.com

[groupgooglecode]
http-proxy-host = localhost
http-proxy-port = 7778
http-proxy-compression = no

item.title: 代码及数学公式示例
item.author: mail@hatterjiang.com Hatter Jiang
item.description:
这是一段代码

#include 

int main(int argc, char** argv) {
    printf("%s\n", "Hello, World!");
}

这是一些数学公式

\[e^{i\pi}+1=0\]

\[\begin{pmatrix} 1/\sqrt{2} & 1/\sqrt{2} \\ -1/\sqrt{2} & 1/\sqrt{2} \end{pmatrix} \begin{pmatrix} 3 \\ 2 \end{pmatrix} = \begin{pmatrix} 5/\sqrt{2} \\ -1/\sqrt{2} \end{pmatrix}\]

\[Var(a)=\frac{1}{m}\sum_{i=1}^m{(a_i-\mu)^2}\]
